name: lib/extended-sorted-array.js
lib/messages.js
MExchange
description: message requesting an exchange of neighborhood

params.name: protocol
params.description: the protocol that creates the message

return.description: Return an object with all parameters and some other details

name: lib/partialview.js
PartialView
description: Structure containing the neighborhood of a peer.

name: constructor
description: Constructor of PartialView

params.name: options.usedCoef
params.description: Represents the amount of clients shuffled between [0;1]

name: getOldest
description: Get the oldest peer in the partialView

return.description: the oldest peer in the array

name: increment
description: Increment the age of the whole partial view

name: getSample
description: Get a sample of the partial view

params.name: neighbor
params.description: the neighbor which performs the exchange with us

params.name: isInitiator
params.description:
whether or not the caller is the initiator of the
exchange

return.description: an array containing neighbors from this partial view

name: replace
description: Replace the occurrences of the old peer by the fresh one

return.description: an array with the replaced occurences

name: addNeighbor
description: Add the neigbhor to the partial view with an age of 0

params.name: config
params.description: the peer to add to the partial view

name: getIndex
description: Get the index of the peer in the partialview

params.name: id
params.description: The id of the peer inside the partialView.

return.description: the index of the peer in the array, -1 if not found

name: removePeer
description: Remove the peer from the partial view

return.description: the removed entry if it exists, null otherwise

name: removeAll
description: Remove all occurrences of the peer and return the number of removals

return.description: the number of occurrences of the removed peer

name: removeSample
description: Remove all the elements contained in the sample in argument

name: length
description: Get the size of the partial view

return.description: the size of the partial view

name: contains
description: Check if the partial view contains the reference

return.description: true if the peer is in the partial view, false otherwise

name: clear
description: brief remove all elements from the partial view

name: get
description: Get the array containing views

name: removePeerAge
description: Remove the peer with the associated age from the partial view

params.name: age
params.description: the age of the peer to remove

return.description: the removed entry if it exists, null otherwise

name: lib/spray.js
Spray
description: Implementation of the random peer sampling Spray

name: constructor
description: You can pass other parameters such as webrtc options

params.name: options.retry
params.description: Number of retry when we send a message

params.name: options.usedCoef
params.description: Amount of clients shuffled between 0 and 1 (ie, [0;1])

name: connection
description: Joining as; or contacted by an outsider

name: leave
description: Leave the network

params.name: timer
params.description:
the timeout before really shutting down. The time can
be spent on healing the network before departure. (In milliseconds)

name: getPeers
description:
Get a set of neighbors from both inview and outview. It is worth
noting that each peer controls its outview, but not its inview. Thus, the
outview may be less versatile.

params.name: k
params.description:
the number of neighbors requested, if k is not defined, it returns
every known identifiers.

name: send
description: Send a message using the id of the arc used to communicate

params.name: id
params.description: the identifier of the communication channel

params.name: retry
params.description: the number of times the protocol tries to send the message each seconds

return.description: true if the message has been sent at first try, false otherwise

name: toString
description: Get the string representation of the partial view of spray

name: updateState
description:
Update the local connection state of the peer and emit an event
if the state is different than at the previous call of this function.
The emitted event is 'statechange' with the
arguments 'connect' | 'partial' | 'disconnect'

name: exchange
description:
Periodically called function that aims to balance the partial view
and to mix the neighborhoods

name: onExchange
description: Event executed when we receive an exchange request

params.name: msg
params.description:
message containing the identifier of the peer that started the
exchange

name: onPeerDown
description:
The function called when a neighbor is unreachable and supposedly
crashed/departed. It probabilistically keeps an arc up

params.name: id
params.description: the identifier of the channel that seems down

name: onArcDown
description:
A connection failed to establish properly, systematically duplicates
an element of the partial view.
